title: Video footage of Riot introducing mods to Boards' new layout

replies.body:
I'm surprised this post hasn't been hit yet.

I was just going over all of my old posts and found this thing which is more applicable now than ever. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/kbz8oQcw-gentlemen-there-has-been-a-downvote-bot-plaguing-the-memes-and-games-boards
They come and go every few minutes. Everything is probably going to get downvoted soon.

Honestly I'm really only still on these boards out of nostalgia. So many memelords and their mains...
{{champion:98}} Melledoneus
{{champion:82}} Malicious Metal
{{champion:92}} RaptorKarr
{{champion:268}} TyrekGoldenspear
And a lot of others.

Laughing Fish is still around to no real surprise. These boards are pretty much done for, though and I'm gonna miss 'em.
The down vote manipulators are some next level sadistic sad fucks who loves to see people suffer

These boards are on hospice anyway. Riot's been revamping the whole site and it won't be long before these are gone.

Gonna miss rickrolling people and making fun of Gameplay. I had more fun on these boards than I did in League itself, ngl. But you know what they say, all good things must come to an end.

And it is 6 AM and I have spent the last several hours browsing back 3-4 years of stale memes. I really should stop being nostalgic of all the cringe I did and just go to sleep.

While most of it was either a rant or just biased opinions, the fact is that this place provided the most gameplay discussions out of all other places.
